website_summaries.verdict: The Asics GT 1000 6 has certainly surprised many runners by delivering reliable quality at a low price. For them, this stability shoe offered excellent comfortability and a good energy return without being too overbearing. When it comes to technology, it may be a little ‘old school’ but the shoe gets its job done and outperforms most of its modern competitors in the market in terms of durability, responsiveness, and performance on the roads.
pros: Most users called this shoe ‘super comfortable’
The majority thought that this running shoe is very durable since it was made using high-quality materials
They wrote that it held up great even after many miles of running
The customers seemed very happy with the reasonable price of the Asics GT 1000 6
Most individuals found its weight comfortably light and therefore ideal for long-distance
The runners highlighted how the midsole provided an excellent ‘arch support’
A few users discussed how this shoe was the ‘right’ combination of comfortable cushioning and a high energy return
The variety of different color schemes were welcomed by many
cons: A few customers found the toe-box a bit narrow, and that it made the shoe a bit uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but feel a wee bit tight at the toes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes I have ran in Asics 1000 series for years and always love them good fit fairly light but I feel the toe box is a little small on these version 6 shoes, just did 7 hilly miles out of the box found the toe box slightly tight at first but not as bad in the end the shoes are well built and quite responsive not sure if I should have got a half size up I always wear a size 8 with no issues, will p,ay about with the lacing system to see how they go
customer_reviews.author: Runningbug

customer_reviews.title: if you have toe nails...look for something else
customer_reviews.text: i have bought 3 pairs of these trainers primarily because they have been kind to my knee's but... in each case after a few months the mesh around the toe area has come apart.. i DO NOT have long toe nails... the mesh is a great idea but it will fail after a period of time i have moved to Nike and wow....havent had the same problem sorry..great fit, kind to knees but if you purchase you will need to replace them within 6 months, your choice
customer_reviews.author: Steve O D

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive enough for running on hard surfaces .
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Asics running shoes for the last 8 years and always found them to be excellent .I thought I would take a chance on the Gt-1000 as they were half the price I usually pay for more expensive Gel type . However after a couple weeks I discovered they are not supportive enough and in fact they feel like running in a pair of leisure footwear rather than proper running shoes . I have therefore assigned these to causal wear and ordered the more expensive Gel type again .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Geoffrey L. Woodland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. This is my first Asics (I had a lot of Mizunos before) and it's fantastic. It is narrower than a Mizuno, so it feels more tight on your feet, but its fine, not a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: I can see why people say these come up small ...
customer_reviews.text: I can see why people say these come up small. For me personally, they fit absolutely perfectly. They're dead comfy to run in, my only concern would be the material around the toe-box wearing through as it is highly breathable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hoy

customer_reviews.title: As good as they’ve ever been
customer_reviews.text: Superb running shoes. I run more than 30 miles a week and love them. Very good inner support and fit exactly as expected despite being a generation on from my last ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacmenet for older version
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my GT-1000 4s which had given me a couple of good years. A few people have commented that these are slightly on the small size but they seemed to fit fine for me - As always I bought half a size bigger than I do for normal shoes. They are clearly a better trainer than the GT-1000 4 but it seems to be an evolution rather than revolution. They are still nice and light whilst offering a good amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: lwa99bgp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been running in Asics since I took it up a few years ago. My last pair were GT1000-5s, so these shoes were a natural progression. Very comfortable fit and €50 cheaper than high street price. I would suggest you go up a full size when buying. I'm normally a UK11, I needed a UK12 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Trainers arrived stained- another customer had same problem
customer_reviews.text: Product came stained with weird black marks all over the white part of trainers. Haven't got time to send them back. Otherwise are fine - if you're not fussed about perfect quality of appearance and just want running shoes I guess they're okay. Having read the reviews another customer on 12th August had similar issue so clearly the company do not care - more interested in shifting faulty goods than listening to customer feedback and addressing problems/providing a good quality product. I will be avoiding this seller from now on!
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: still a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: like other reviewers I too have found these to be a wee bit tighter fitting(for some perverse reason the shoes made in Vietnam seem to be a slightly smaller last) good shoe none the less perhaps they are trying to follow the fashion trend of making things narrower(ie: hiking boots)
customer_reviews.author: kiwijock

customer_reviews.title: Well made i got them dirty and covered in mud chucked them in the washing ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made i got them dirty and covered in mud chucked them in the washing machine and they came out looking new and still fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I take size 9, Bought size 9.5 - still too small
customer_reviews.author: Philip James Benham

customer_reviews.title: Total Comfort and Support
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best pair of trainers I've ever worn!! Durable, lightweight and extremely comfortable, I can't recommend them highly enough!! I have Asics squash shoes as well and they fit me perfectly. Maybe it's the shape of my feet but the Asics seem to fit me best over the other top brands.
customer_reviews.author: amazonner

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the v5 for me
customer_reviews.text: A lower heel than the v5 so it slips a lot. I get a blister on the back of my ankle after a short run. I use a heel lock lace tie so this should not happen. I have previously owned the v4 and v5 versions of this shoe. It's definitely the shoe that has changed. I don't know why they keep changing this shoe. The GT-1000 v4 was perfect, I wish I could still get it.
customer_reviews.author: Osphorus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just had these shoes a few days but they’re already brilliant. Tried them out today for my run and they are extremely comfortable. Nice colour too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best slight-overpronator shoes with excellent support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Always used Asics Gel Kayano and now - my son does too......
customer_reviews.author: StanthemanRetoma

customer_reviews.title: Second hand
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in box when opened they had clearly been used before must of been a returned item
customer_reviews.author: D W L Barns

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little tight overall and the Achilles’ tendon protector ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little tight overall and the Achilles’ tendon protector bit (no idea what it’s called ) is lower than in previous versions and as a result the show somehow feels less secure on the foot .. lock lacing might fix it for you. But still it’s a lovely shoe .
customer_reviews.author: Stu762

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly as described. The one shoe feels a little tight, always had this size of Asics before. Might just need wearing in.
customer_reviews.author: bladingmotorhead

customer_reviews.title: Good value running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes at a good price- if you know your ASICS size this is a cheaper way to go.
customer_reviews.author: I S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe, my second pair of GT 1000. Good price fast delivery and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe even better price. Disappointed the site increased the price as I tried to buy a second pair soon after
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tight fitting even though I bought a size up. Not the normal Asics quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice ASICS Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but I’m a 10 in shoes and need an 11 in these. Otherwise they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Bub

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The inside support has a hole after less than 200 miles running and 6 months of use. Have worn Gt 1000 past 4 years but these are nowhere same level of quality. Will be returning to Asics rather than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MJD42

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. The only thing is they had small black marks at the side of the soles. I decided to keep them, due to the fact i am doing a half marathon in two weeks time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good value shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy with plenty of cushioning for the longer runs. Fit as expected but if you have wide feet they may feel tight. Good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Furlong

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Asians. They are well built ...
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Asics . They are well built but the left shoe did rub badly. Now on a replacement pair and will hopefully benefit when training for my first 10k
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy!!!! Go .5 above your normal size. So 8.5 instead of 8 for example.
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not used much yet but fantastic fit, feels great when running.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Asics trainers
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing Asics for at least 20 years. Not sure if Asics have altered their fitting sizes but this is the first pair i have had which are quite narrow. Would suggest going half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: raymond miller

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. 2 holes have appeared within 2 months of purchase. 1 in inner heel lining, 1 on the outside above the big toe. I can't have run more that 50km.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Amasanti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrower than expected but excellent quality. Definitely go up a size when getting these.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes my other half says they are like wearing slippers very comfy
customer_reviews.author: caroline wynne

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best support shoes ever! I have a flat feet and when I use to go for longer distance run it was always hearting. Knees and feet was out of order after 10k. This is my second gt1000, and I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Great service...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad product, fantastic service. Quality is not as good as previous GT1000 but still a decent shoe for lightweight training
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: great trainers
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd pair of these after just completing 800+ km in the previous pair. They are robust and strong as well as being very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: They look like decent trainers but I am a size 9 and they were too tight especially width. Sending back and getting size 9.5. Shame as they are £5 more for half a size bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good running trainers for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Really good trainers, a good fit and really good support. For someone with a high arch they are what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my friend for his marathon run. He was very impressed and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Junaid Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shoe it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually an 8 but it was too big. I went for the 7.5 and it fits amazing and so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wearing out after only 2 months of light use, replacement ordered, fingers crossed for the next pair.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for just over two months and have already worn through the heel padding. Replacement ordered, let's see how the next pair go...
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve juat purchased a pair of running shoes from Asics - perfect for me, as all prevoius Asics I’ve had before!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a good colour and better than the photo
customer_reviews.text: These are a good colour and better than the photo. Was worried that they were slightly purple but they are a dark blue, almost Navy
customer_reviews.author: oxmom

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Fit not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very firm shoe. Too tight across the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Repeat order
customer_reviews.text: Always order same make and size. Always fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for squash asics best shoes ever never buy any other make
customer_reviews.author: v norrington

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not run in them yet, but initially a tighter fit than previous model I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stephen Howes

customer_reviews.title: Great service from
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, trainers fit well and are as described. Great service from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dr. James M. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he says they fit perfect and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable for walking and running .Really liked them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with Asics Gt 1000 Running shoes, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: G Kenyon-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Back to Asics and these best so far
customer_reviews.text: Part time runner - normally undertake half marathon and 10k every year. Started out with Asics about 7 years ago and stuck with then for about 5 years, then moved to Nike and then New Balance (both top end models). Went back to Asics with this purchase and was a great decision. These feel like a supportive shoe with cushioning - the Nike and New Balance just didn't absorb shocks that great or give support enough. I am a heavy runner too. Probably best running trainers I have had (recognising I am a part timer and acknowledging there are other quality running shoes out there).
customer_reviews.author: dommersj

customer_reviews.title: These provide the level of cushioning that feel good for me while generally being a good fit and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the style of these have have bought several different ones over the years. These provide the level of cushioning that feel good for me while generally being a good fit and being pretty robust. I can't fault the quality of these, they are the same as the others I've purchased but my only complaint is that they seem a little narrow compared to others I've had so I can't really wear them for more than a couple of hours at a time. Not too much of a problem but annoying as I wish they'd fit like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: now these baby’s are excellent.. like skipping on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Superb trainer..I got these as I’ve always skipped as part as my training..but after a few years not doing it (knee injury) I’ve just started skipping again but the trainers I had (good quality Adidas) weren’t helping with the impact..now these baby’s are excellent..like skipping on carpet..5* all the way
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Not an asics quality product
customer_reviews.text: I received the Asics Gt 1000 6 promptly. The white sole had few dark dots (inclusion). Looks like an item which should have been rejected during QC checks or this could be a factory second sale item. I never expected defective product to be sold from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Safeer T Peedikayil

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gt-1000 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Modern running shoes from Asics. These shoes have a breathable mesh and synthetic upper. Super-speva-midsole and visible rearfoot gel® cushioning system offer high impact cushioning. The removable ortholite sockliner increases comfort. The seamless construction gives high comfort. The outsole ensures optimal grip. Ideal for mid and long distance running.
feature_bullets: ComforDry Sockliner - Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and moisture-wicking for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
Dynamic DuoMax Support System - A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability, positioned sport-specifically.
SpEVA Midsole - Improves bounce-back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
Rearfoot GEL Cushioning System - Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
